page.title: 09BELTON ESTATE 2.
page.content: The Open Parkland beyond the house and its two majestic avenues of trees offers a herd of fallow deer grazing & running space. One of the avenues to the S of the house was recently cut drastically to remove diseased & dangerous trees. Majestic Chestnut and Proud Oaks dot the park. To the S & E is the outstanding local Golf Course which has a large & thriving membership. The game being played in the most attractive of settings. Belton Park Club is one of the oldest in the country, carved out of the estate lands it has 27 holes. Recently a 73 year old member scored his second hole in one at the 152 yard hole. He was given a coveted Johnnie Walker international award; a hand scripted parchment certificate, a gold golf bag & a bottle of fine 12 year old whisky. The club encourages all players.
